alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lackawanna, Luzerne and Wyoming Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 912 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Lovelton to near Ricketts Glen State Park to Lightstreet. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Falls, Hazleton, Muhlenberg, Kingston, Berwick, Nanticoke, Plains and Old Forge. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 262. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 145 and 182A and B, and between 194 and 202. Interstate 476 between 105 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
